description:
Get on the fast track to becoming a Legend with the Triple Threat Pack! Feel the unbridled power of 3 exclusive Class-C cars, plus a load of resources to fuel your drive to the top!

This pack contains:
• 50 Blueprints to unlock the Artega Scalo Superelletra
• 35 Blueprints to unlock the Maserati Alfieri
• 35 Blueprints to unlock the Arrinera Hussarya 33
• 1 exclusive decal for the Artega Scalo Superelletra
• 750,000 Credits 
• 750 Tokens
name: Asphalt 9: Legends Triple Threat Pack
